channel.title: Add a browser sign-in solution for mobile devices :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add a browser sign-in solution for mobile devices Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Add a intro paragraph specifically stating what scenarios this implementation is used for. When would i use this scenario over direct auth? We need to make it clear that this is a Non-interaction code implementation Remove “Native” and use Mobile instead.
